summary: Now fits female characters but may be a bit big. Sorry
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------Version 2 out---------------------------------------
1: Added a smaller version of the current armor to fit smaller characters. ( A _0 .nif)
2: Changed all Crafting Locations to Daedric.
3: Added Robes as requested by viewers. Added Rips in cloak
5: Changed the neck \"scarf\" texture.
6: Eliminated the eyes from showing through, as well as other body parts on the helmet.
-----------------------Acknowledged bugs----------------------------
1: This should fit on females head now, but it might be pretty big. Sorry. 
2: Argonians and some races other than human may experience some glitches.(Should fit them too now)
3: The armor is reported to have some strange lighting occasionally. Will look into it.
4: This armor does NOT appear when it is dropped. And cannot be placed on Mannequins yet. 
(Priority)
5: Does not appear properly in inventory.
author: Owatch

files.name: Witch King Of Angmar Version 2
